timeline.bodyText: Does this get called when a sleeping machine is woken up? I think I got most of it but wondering how the check is enforced the moment the user returns to their machine.
timeline.author: ericsong

replies.bodyText:
This line was actually just a refactoring of a check which was already here - no logic changed on this line. I didn't think hard about why it was here; I think this was to catch returning users.
It won't necessarily be enforced the moment they return to their machine, it will be enforced either:

When they next interact with the page: L175, or
when the interval check resets the timers (within <1m of machine wakeup): L163
replies.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: Got it. L175 was what I was looking for.
replies.author: ericsong
